languages.text: "Не смею оправдывать свои наимерзейшие просчеты, Ваша Светлость! Лишь умоляю о милости и снисхождении! Все исправим! Оправдаем! Не подведем, честное слово!"

"I dare not make excuses for my most despicable blunders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I merely beg your mercy and clemency! We'll set everything right! We'll prove our worth! We won't fail you, I swear!"
languages.original_text: "Не смею оправдывать свои наимерзейшие просчеты, Ваша Светлость! Лишь умоляю о милости и снисхождении! Все исправим! Оправдаем! Не подведем, честное слово!"

traits.locale_text: "I dare not make excuses for my most despicable blunders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I merely beg your mercy and clemency! We'll set everything right! We'll prove our worth! We won't fail you, I swear!"

"I dare not make excuses for my most despicable blunders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I merely beg your mercy and clemency! We'll set everything right! We'll prove our worth! We won't fail you, I swear!"

languages.text: “我不敢为我卑鄙之极的过失找借口，大人！我只求得到您的仁慈和宽恕！我们会改成一切错误！我们会证明我们的价值！我们绝不会令您失望，我发誓！”
languages.original_text: "I dare not make excuses for my most despicable blunders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I merely beg your mercy and clemency! We'll set everything right! We'll prove our worth! We won't fail you, I swear!"

traits.locale_text: “我不敢为我卑鄙之极的过失找借口，大人！我只求得到您的仁慈和宽恕！我们会改成一切错误！我们会证明我们的价值！我们绝不会令您失望，我发誓！”

languages.text: 「陛下、私は自分の卑劣極まりない失態の言い訳をするつもりはありません！ただ、あなたの慈悲と寛容を請うだけです！我々で全てを正します！我々の価値を証明してみます！誓って期待を裏切りません。約束します！」
languages.original_text: "I dare not make excuses for my most despicable blunders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I merely beg your mercy and clemency! We'll set everything right! We'll prove our worth! We won't fail you, I swear!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、私は自分の卑劣極まりない失態の言い訳をするつもりはありません！ただ、あなたの慈悲と寛容を請うだけです！我々で全てを正します！我々の価値を証明してみます！誓って期待を裏切りません。約束します！」

languages.text: «¡No me atrevo a excusar mis errores más viles, mi{mf|lord|lady}, me limito a implorar su misericordia y clemencia! ¡Lo arreglaremos todo! ¡Demostraremos nuestra valía! ¡Juro que no le fallaremos!».
languages.original_text: "I dare not make excuses for my most despicable blunders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I merely beg your mercy and clemency! We'll set everything right! We'll prove our worth! We won't fail you, I swear!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No me atrevo a excusar mis errores más viles, mi{mf|lord|lady}, me limito a implorar su misericordia y clemencia! ¡Lo arreglaremos todo! ¡Demostraremos nuestra valía! ¡Juro que no le fallaremos!».

languages.text: "Ich wage es nicht, Ausreden für meine schändlichen Fehler zu suchen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Ich flehe lediglich um Gnade und Milde! Wir biegen alles wieder hin! Wir beweisen, was wir wert sind! Wir werden Euch nicht enttäuschen, das schwöre ich!"
languages.original_text: "I dare not make excuses for my most despicable blunders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I merely beg your mercy and clemency! We'll set everything right! We'll prove our worth! We won't fail you, I swear!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich wage es nicht, Ausreden für meine schändlichen Fehler zu suchen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Ich flehe lediglich um Gnade und Milde! Wir biegen alles wieder hin! Wir beweisen, was wir wert sind! Wir werden Euch nicht enttäuschen, das schwöre ich!"

languages.text: « J'ai aucune excuse pour toutes les bourdes que j'ai commises, Votre Seigneurie ! Je peux qu'implorer votre clémencité ! On va tout arranger ! On vous montrera de quoi on est capables ! On vous décevra pas, je vous le jure ! »
languages.original_text: "I dare not make excuses for my most despicable blunders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I merely beg your mercy and clemency! We'll set everything right! We'll prove our worth! We won't fail you, I swear!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai aucune excuse pour toutes les bourdes que j'ai commises, Votre Seigneurie ! Je peux qu'implorer votre clémencité ! On va tout arranger ! On vous montrera de quoi on est capables ! On vous décevra pas, je vous le jure ! »

languages.text: "Tarif edilmez büyüklükteki hatalarım için bahane üretme cüretinde bulunamam {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Tek yapabileceğim, merhametinizi ve hoşgörünüzü dilemektir! Her şeyi yoluna sokacağız! Değerimizi size kanıtlayacağız! Sizi yüzüstü bırakmayacağız! Yemin ediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "I dare not make excuses for my most despicable blunders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I merely beg your mercy and clemency! We'll set everything right! We'll prove our worth! We won't fail you, I swear!"

traits.locale_text: "Tarif edilmez büyüklükteki hatalarım için bahane üretme cüretinde bulunamam {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Tek yapabileceğim merhametinizi ve hoşgörünüzü dilemek! Her şeyi yoluna sokacağız! Değerimizi size kanıtlayacağız! Sizi yüz üstü bırakmayacağız! Yemin ediyorum!"
